languages.text: {n}Маражай издает ядовитый смешок.{/n} "Не удивлюсь, если эта мон-кай болтает о мандрагорах. Приходят из теней... черные как душа Векта... злые как разъяренный ур-гуль... Странно, что твои сородичи все еще живы, {name}. Видимо, мандрагоры растягивают удовольствие от наводимого ими ужаса".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай издает мелодичный ядовитый смех.{/n} "Не удивлюсь, если эта мон-кай болтает о мандрагорах. Приходят из теней... черные как душа Векта... злые как разъяренный ур-гуль... Хах! Странно, что твои никчемные сородичи все еще живы!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lets out a vicious laugh.{/n} "I would not be surprised if this mon-keigh was speaking of Mandrakes. They come from the shadows... as black as Vect's soul... as savage as an enraged ur-ghul... It is strange that your kin are still alive, {name}. The Mandrakes must be prolonging their own pleasure by terrorising the mon-keigh again and again."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай издает ядовитый смешок.{/n} "Не удивлюсь, если эта мон-кай болтает о мандрагорах. Приходят из теней... черные как душа Векта... злые как разъяренный ур-гуль... Странно, что твои сородичи все еще живы, {name}. Видимо, мандрагоры растягивают удовольствие от наводимого ими ужаса".

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋发出了恶毒的笑声。{/n}“如果这只猴子说的是曼德拉，那我一点都不惊讶。它们从阴影中来……像维克特的灵魂一样黑……像狂暴的乌古尔一样野……你的族人居然还能活着，这可真够怪的，{name}。那些曼德拉肯定是打算一次次吓唬这些猴子，以此延长快乐的时光。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a vicious laugh.{/n} "I would not be surprised if this mon-keigh was speaking of Mandrakes. They come from the shadows... as black as Vect's soul... as savage as an enraged ur-ghul... It is strange that your kin are still alive, {name}. The Mandrakes must be prolonging their own pleasure by terrorising the mon-keigh again and again."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋发出了恶毒的笑声。{/n}“如果这只猴子说的是曼德拉，那我一点都不惊讶。它们从阴影中来……像维克特的灵魂一样黑……像狂暴的乌古尔一样野……你的族人居然还能活着，这可真够怪的，{name}。那些曼德拉肯定是打算一次次吓唬这些猴子，以此延长快乐的时光。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai deja escapar una risa cruel.{/n} «No me sorprendería que esta mon-keigh estuviera hablando de las mandrágoras. Surgen de las sombras... son tan negras como el alma de Vect... tan salvajes como un ur-ghul furioso... Me impresiona que los tuyos sigan con vida, {name}. Las mandrágoras deben de estar torturando a los mon-keigh poco a poco para prolongar su disfrute».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a vicious laugh.{/n} "I would not be surprised if this mon-keigh was speaking of Mandrakes. They come from the shadows... as black as Vect's soul... as savage as an enraged ur-ghul... It is strange that your kin are still alive, {name}. The Mandrakes must be prolonging their own pleasure by terrorising the mon-keigh again and again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai deja escapar una risa cruel.{/n} «No me sorprendería que esta mon-keigh estuviera hablando de las mandrágoras. Surgen de las sombras... son tan negras como el alma de Vect... tan salvajes como un ur-ghul furioso... Me impresiona que los tuyos sigan con vida, {name}. Las mandrágoras deben de estar torturando a los mon-keigh poco a poco para prolongar su disfrute».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは意地悪く笑う。{/n}「もしこのモン＝ケイがマンドレイクのことを話していても俺様は驚かない。やつらは影からやって来るんだ…ヴェクトの魂と同じくらい黒い…激怒したウル＝グールのように野蛮なんだ…お前の同胞がまだ生きているとは奇妙なことだな、{name}。マンドレイクはモン=ケイを何度も何度も怖がらせて、自分たちの快楽を引き延ばしているに違いない」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a vicious laugh.{/n} "I would not be surprised if this mon-keigh was speaking of Mandrakes. They come from the shadows... as black as Vect's soul... as savage as an enraged ur-ghul... It is strange that your kin are still alive, {name}. The Mandrakes must be prolonging their own pleasure by terrorising the mon-keigh again and again."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは意地悪く笑う。{/n}「もしこのモン＝ケイがマンドレイクのことを話していても俺様は驚かない。やつらは影からやって来るんだ…ヴェクトの魂と同じくらい黒い…激怒したウル＝グールのように野蛮なんだ…お前の同胞がまだ生きているとは奇妙なことだな、{name}。マンドレイクはモン=ケイを何度も何度も怖がらせて、自分たちの快楽を引き延ばしているに違いない」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai éclate d'un rire malveillant.{/n} « Je ne serais pas surpris que cette mon-keigh parle de Mandragores. Elles viennent de l'obscurité... aussi noires que l'âme de Vect... aussi sauvages qu'un ur-ghul enragé... C'est étrange que les vôtres soient encore en vie, {name}. Les Mandragores doivent faire durer leur plaisir en terrorisant leurs proies encore et encore. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a vicious laugh.{/n} "I would not be surprised if this mon-keigh was speaking of Mandrakes. They come from the shadows... as black as Vect's soul... as savage as an enraged ur-ghul... It is strange that your kin are still alive, {name}. The Mandrakes must be prolonging their own pleasure by terrorising the mon-keigh again and again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai éclate d'un rire malveillant.{/n} « Je ne serais pas surpris que cette mon-keigh parle de mandragores. Elles viennent de l'obscurité... aussi noires que l'âme de Vect... aussi sauvages qu'un ur-ghul enragé... C'est étrange que les vôtres soient encore en vie, {name}. Les mandragores doivent faire durer leur plaisir en terrorisant leurs proies encore et encore. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lacht bösartig.{/n} "Es würde mich nicht wundern, wenn dieser Chem-Pan-Sey von Mandraks spricht. Sie kommen aus den Schatten ... schwarz wie Vects Seele ... wild wie ein erzürnter Yr'ghul ... Es ist merkwürdig, dass die Euren noch am Leben sind, {name}. Vermutlich verlängern die Mandraks ihren Spaß, indem sie die Chem-Pan-Sey wieder und wieder terrorisieren."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a vicious laugh.{/n} "I would not be surprised if this mon-keigh was speaking of Mandrakes. They come from the shadows... as black as Vect's soul... as savage as an enraged ur-ghul... It is strange that your kin are still alive, {name}. The Mandrakes must be prolonging their own pleasure by terrorising the mon-keigh again and again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lacht bösartig.{/n} "Es würde mich nicht wundern, wenn dieser Chem-Pan-Sey von Mandraks spricht. Sie kommen aus den Schatten ... schwarz wie Vects Seele ... wild wie ein erzürnter Yr'ghul ... Es ist merkwürdig, dass die Euren noch am Leben sind, {name}. Vermutlich verlängern die Mandraks ihren Spaß, indem sie die Chem-Pan-Sey wieder und wieder terrorisieren."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gaddarca gülümsüyor.{/n} "Bu mon-keigh'in sözünü ettiği şey Kankurutanlarsa hiç şaşırmam. Gölgelerden gelirler; Vect'in ruhu kadar siyahtır, öfkeli bir ur-gûl kadar vaşhidirler. Türdeşlerinin hâlâ hayatta olması tuhaf {name}. Kankurutanlar, aldıkları hazzı uzatmak için mon-keighlere tekrar tekrar dehşet saçıyor olmalı."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a vicious laugh.{/n} "I would not be surprised if this mon-keigh was speaking of Mandrakes. They come from the shadows... as black as Vect's soul... as savage as an enraged ur-ghul... It is strange that your kin are still alive, {name}. The Mandrakes must be prolonging their own pleasure by terrorising the mon-keigh again and again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gaddarca gülümsüyor.{/n} "Bu mon-keigh'in sözünü ettiği şey Kankurutanlarsa hiç şaşırmam. Gölgelerden gelirler, Vect'in ruhu kadar siyahtırlar ve öfkeli bir ur-ghul kadar vaşhidirler. Türdeşlerinin hâlâ hayatta olması tuhaf {name}. Kankurutanlar, mon-keighlere tekrar tekrar dehşet saçarak, aldıkları hazzı uzatıyor olmalılar."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
